casebody.data:
WILKES
v.
CITY OF GREENVILLE. No. 368P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 12, 2015. Anita B. Hunt, Durham, for Wilkes, Johnnie. Matthew P. Blake, Raleigh, for City of Greenville, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of November 2015 by Defendant-Appellant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of November 2015."
